groupaffiliation: Formerly affiliated with Gods of Heliopolis
knownrelatives: Neith (Gaea, grandmother), Nun (Demiurge, grandfather), Ammon Ra (Atum, father), Thoth (uncle), Shu (brother), Sekhmet (Lion God, brother), Tefnut (sister), Khonshu (Chons, half-brother), Hathor (half-sister), Mahes (Apedemak, son) Geb  (nephew), Nut (niece), Osiris, Seth (grandnephews), others
powers: Bast has typically godly superhuman strength, durability, longevity, etc. Appearing most commonly as an immense black panther or a humanoid panther, Bast has both male and female forms, and typically empowers others. Empowered by the sun, Bast is one of the most powerful of the Ennead.
